Articles.Content:
This here ladies and gents is the finest in almost all stock Newton\'s law breaking goodness. Just set up the Mechjeb; fire the rocket at full; quickly stop thrust and stage; and then GAIN velocity WITHOUT engines.

Requirements: KW challenger pack; C7\'s original parts (maybe experimental), (for ONLY the rockets fuel tank); and the PLF set. (tell me if there is a problem)

And that is what we here like to call, the magic turbine, AKA the infiniglide bug.

It\'s well known
